gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 122, Pistons 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Pistons, 122-103. Pascal Siakam led Indiana with 25 points, eight rebounds, and four assists as Tyrese Haliburton added 20 points and nine assists. Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 23 points, 10 assists, and six rebounds. The Pacers improve to 39-31 as the Pistons fall to 12-57.
